name: Hungry Snake - City
description:
Eat as many objects as you can and become the longest snake! You can eat everything you can find.

Unlock 20 unique and beautiful skins, including a snowman, el mariachi, skeleton, and many others. 5 unique maps with awesome atmosphere won't let you get bored!

There are lots of objects scattered around the map, so choose your strategy wisely. Some snakes prefer eating more small objects, other snakes eat objects as large as they can. Sometimes a rival snake can steal your food so watch out!

Become the longest snake in this city!
